column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place is a menace to the waistlines of Chicago.  Great food and the price we good.  We waiting a long time for seating
column2: waiting outside on the street. That's the only negative I have
column4: and I still give them 4 stars!  The classic deep dish pizza is awesome.  The  cheese and spinach stuffed bread is great.  The salad was "good".  The portions on the pasta we ordered were huge
column5: the child's size isn't bad for an adult
column6: and the adult size would feed 2.
